title: Establishing a Trump Route for International Peace and Prosperity Working Group
summary: The document is a presidential determination issued on August 8, 2025, directing the Secretary of State to establish a working group within 180 days. This group will focus on developing the Trump Route for International Peace and Prosperity (TRIPP), aimed at enhancing economic connectivity in the South Caucasus and serving as a symbol of peace for future generations. The determination is to be published in the Federal Register.
